ANTI.DESC: manage various automod settings for the server
ANTI.GHOSTPING: detects and logs ghost mentions in your server
ANTI.SPAM: enable or disable spam message detection
ANTI.MASS_MENTION: enable or disable mass mention detection
ANTI.GHOSTPING_ENABLED: Done! Ghostping detection is now enabled.
ANTI.GHOSTPING_DISABLED: Done! Ghostping detection is now disabled.
ANTI.SPAM_ENABLED: Done! Spam detection is now enabled.
ANTI.SPAM_DISABLED: Done! Spam detection is now disabled.
ANTI.MASS_MENTION_ENABLED: Done! Mass mention detection is now enabled. Threshold is set to {{threshold}} mentions.
ANTI.MASS_MENTION_DISABLED: Done! Mass mention detection is now disabled.

DELETE.DESC: manage the auto-delete settings for the server
DELETE.ANTI_ATTACH: enable or disable auto-delete for attachments
DELETE.ANTI_INVITE: enable or disable auto-delete for invites
DELETE.ANTI_LINKS: enable or disable auto-delete for links
DELETE.ANTI_MAXLINES: sets maximum lines allowed per message (0 to disable)
DELETE.ANTI_ATTACHMENTS_ON: Messages with attachments will now be auto-deleted.
DELETE.ANTI_ATTACHMENTS_OFF: Messages with attachments will no longer be auto-deleted.
DELETE.ANTI_INVITES_ON: Messages with invites will now be auto-deleted.
DELETE.ANTI_INVITES_OFF: Messages with invites will no longer be auto-deleted.
DELETE.ANTI_LINKS_ON: Messages with links will now be auto-deleted.
DELETE.ANTI_LINKS_OFF: Messages with links will no longer be auto-deleted.
DELETE.ANTI_MAXLINES_NAN: Amount must be a number input.
DELETE.ANTI_MAXLINES_SET: Maximum lines per message is now set to {{amount}}.
DELETE.ANTI_MAXLINES_DISABLED: Maximum lines per message is now disabled.

AUTOMOD.CONFIG_DESC: configure automod settings for this guild
AUTOMOD.CONFIG_STATUS: check automod configuration for this guild
AUTOMOD.CONFIG_LOG: configure automod log channel for this guild
AUTOMOD.CONFIG_LOG_CHANNEL: the channel to send automod logs to
AUTOMOD.CONFIG_STRIKES: set maximum number of strikes before taking an action
AUTOMOD.CONFIG_STRIKES_AMOUNT: the amount of strikes to give before a punishment is applied (default 5)
AUTOMOD.CONFIG_ACTION: set the action to take when a user reaches the maximum number of strikes
AUTOMOD.CONFIG_ACTION_TYPE: the action to take (kick, ban, mute, none)
AUTOMOD.CONFIG_DEBUG: enable/disable automod for messages sent by admins & moderators
AUTOMOD.CONFIG_WHITELIST_ADD: add a channel to the whitelist
AUTOMOD.CONFIG_WHITELIST_ADD_CH: the channel to add to the whitelist
AUTOMOD.CONFIG_WHITELIST_REM: remove a channel from the whitelist
AUTOMOD.CONFIG_WHITELIST_REM_CH: the channel to remove from the whitelist
AUTOMOD.LOG_CHANNEL_NO_PERMS: Ugh! I cannot send logs to that channel? I need the `Write Messages` and `Embed Links` permissions in that channel
AUTOMOD.LOG_CHANNEL_SET: Done! Automod logs will now be sent to {{channel}}.
AUTOMOD.LOG_CHANNEL_RESET: Done! Automod logs will no longer be sent to a channel.
AUTOMOD.STRIKES_SET: Done! Maximum strikes is now set to {{amount}}.
AUTOMOD.TIMEOUT_NO_PERMS: I do not permission to timeout members
AUTOMOD.KICK_NO_PERMS: I do not permission to kick members
AUTOMOD.BAN_NO_PERMS: I do not permission to ban members
AUTOMOD.ACTION_SET: Done! Action is now set to {{action}}.
AUTOMOD.DEBUG_ENABLED: Done! Debug mode is now enabled.
AUTOMOD.DEBUG_DISABLED: Done! Debug mode is now disabled.
AUTOMOD.WHITELIST_REMOVED: Done! Channel is no longer whitelisted.
